Недавно моя мама куда-то ушла и я не мог ей дозвониться. Я сильно волновался за неё, я думал, что с ней что-то случилось( Но благодаря этой замечательной игре я узнал где находиться моя мама и что она сейчас делает! Спасибо за эту прекрасную игру!!!!!!!

This game is very fun to play around with friends. I also was able to meet a lot of new people as well and I was very happy with my experience playing. Takes a while to get around the learning curve but it is well worth it.
Still one of the best instant action FPS on the planet !
An okayish FPS full of cheaters with no ADS and a source engine like it's still 2004. No real changes in years and thousands upon thousands of pointless skins. Also, absolutely ZERO customer support.
Если играть с глобалам всё окей
Jogo que só me faz refletir que, mesmo eu tendo gastado mais de 300 horas nisso, continuo sendo horrivel e nunca vou melhorar, tirando o jogo é pessimo
这是竞技性最强的团队FPS游戏。
Free to play hat nur dazu geführt, dass noch wesentlich mehr Cheater das Spielerlebnis ruinieren. Ich rate von Installation und Kauf (Premium-Upgrade) ab, wer seine Zeit nicht verschwenden möchte.
玩了这么久fps 还是觉得cs玩不腻

If you want to play without hackers on official competitive servers you need to have and old and trusted steam account (Trust Factor)

otherwise if your account is new and there is no game besides CS:GO you will run into hackers every game.

If your trust factor is low there is no escaping except Faceit or ESEA

[spoiler]You are hacking too ;)[/spoiler]
